response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. After careful consideration, I am extending this offer to you at a price of $750,000. This exceptional item not only represents a significant investment but also carries a potential for growth and appreciation over time. I believe it aligns well with your interests and could be a valuable addition to your collection or portfolio. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if you have any questions. I look forward to the possibility of working with you.", "product_price": 750000}
